projects.seo:
Property in Alanya from developer Is the most convenient and profitable option for those who want To buy an apartment on the shores of the Mediterranean seas... If you want to moveto Turkey for permanent residence or start a profitable business In Alania, then you need to carefully consider the choice of apartments... And the specialists of BestHome Construction will help you with this.

Turkey- an amazing country with a wonderful climate and a high standard of living. In residencesAlanyaeverything is created for the most carefree, fun, and safe life. Facilities infrastructure in Alanyathought out to the smallest detail. External and internal finishing of the apartments amazes with aesthetics, quality, and stylish decor.

In this article, we will talk about the most important points to pay attention to when choosing a home. In Alania... If you want to know how much is the property, write or call us. We are always ready to answer any questions.

Real estate in Turkey from the developer

Foreigners wishing inexpensively buy real estate in Turkey, you definitely need to visit In Alania... The best is waiting for your beaches, amazing sights, magnificent views from balconies and terraces, first-class residential complexes with modern infrastructure.

Avsallar, Konakli, Oba, Kestel, Cikcilli, Mahmutlar - every district Alanyahas advantages. But the greatest demand isreal estate in the center of Alanya...

Apartments in Alanya for permanent residence and recreation

For many, it is no longer a secret that buying real estate in Alanya gives the right to obtain citizenship in Turkey according to a simplified scheme. Developers offer a variety of options, ranging from inexpensive studios to luxurious penthouses and duplexes with furniture and appliances.

To live in incenter or provinces Alanya with a family is the dream of many foreigners, including Russians. Wonderful climate, beautiful nature, friendly people, accessible prices for life, and a huge amount of entertainment within walking distance. Shops, restaurants, shopping and entertainment centers, sports grounds, spa salons, boutiques of world-famous brands, and snow-white sand beaches that stretch for tens of kilometers.

If you want to buy property in Alanya for a family or a seasonal holiday, it is better to choose real estate from the developer... Canbuyhousing under construction to save money. The high quality of construction and finishing is guaranteed, as well as compliance with the deadlines for the delivery of objects.

How To buy an apartment in the town Alanya?

Too inexpensive to buy apartments, you don't have to go to Turkey... Although it will not be superfluous to see the residence with your own eyes and evaluate the pros and cons of the infrastructure. Today many developers offer a full range of sales services in real estate in Alanya... Foreigners can get a great deal without leaving their home country.

Registration of documents is carried out online through proxies. Complete transparency of transactions is guaranteed if you partner with a trusted company such as BestHome.

To buy apartments, you need to place an application on the website. Range of offers on the market turkey huge, but it is important to consider the real benefits and find out the details, including the exact footage of the living space, distance from the beach, infrastructure and service features.

Price for real estate in Alanya, choice of area

How much does an apartment cost in Alanya and its suburbs such as Mahmutlar, Oba, Konakli, Cikcilli, Avsallar, Kestel? It all depends on the following factors.

  • Square apartments.
  • The proximity of the residential complex to the sea.
  • Infrastructure.
  • Choice of area.
  • Developer.

For example, if you want to buy real estate in the center of Alanya inexpensively then it is better to pay attention to the objects during the construction phase. In the suburbsMahmutlar, you can find profitable options in ready-made residences located near the best Alanya beaches... The closer to the center, so real estate in Alanya is more expensive, but you can always find accommodation in the provinces of Turkey, considering your budget and requirements, if you contact BestHome.

How to buy an apartment in Alanya inexpensively from the developer

You don't have to research all the offers on the market to get a great deal. First, study the developers. Assess their advantages and possible disadvantages. Find out what guarantees are provided. Clarify what is the price of housing in a finished complex in Turkey and facilities under construction.

The more details you learn, the faster and cheaper you can buy housing on the shores of the Mediterranean seas... BestHome managers are always ready for dialogue. We help our clients buy real estate in the center cities Alanya, taking into account all their requirements and wishes, as well as financial capabilities.

Apartments in the complexes of the developer BestHome

BestHome Construction is confidently leading the market Alanyafor over 15 years. In our catalog, there are more than 30 completed projects, where you can in a short time and inexpensively buy an apartment for every taste.

We will help you find apartments with one, two, three, and four bedrooms. We will be glad to offer you luxurious penthouses and duplexes if you are interested in real estate in the Alanya premium class.

We provide a guarantee of 5 years for finishing and all internal communications, including electricity and water supply. For construction and finishing, we use the latest generation of building materials. The planning and decor are developed by professional designers and architects.

We guarantee the safety of residential complexes inTurkey- they are guarded 24/7. The infrastructure is maintained by specially trained employees of the company. The beaches on the shores of the Mediterranean seas are always clean and well-groomed, equipped with sun loungers, changing cabins, and toilets.

We have provided everything for the convenience of our residents, from decor and equipment to the location of residential complexes. Within walking distance is everything that modern people need for life and recreation, including kindergartens, schools, and hospitals.

The BestHome catalog containsreal estate, how in center of Alanyaand in the suburbs Kestel, Konakli, Oba, Cikcilli, Mahmutlar, Avsallar. To clarify prices you can always visit our website or from the manager. We offer buyers favorable terms of payment by installments for the purchase of the real estate in Alanya during the construction phase. The legal purity of each transaction is guaranteed.

header.text: Over the past 10 years, the Republic of Turkey has replenished its treasury with foreign investment of $ 100 billion. What attracts investors from Russia, the United States and Europe? Economic stability, political liberality to foreign investors, high quality of construction, relatively low taxes on the purchase of apartments and houses. And in recent years, the possibility of obtaining Turkish citizenship under a simplified scheme has also been added.

service_online_purchase.seo_title: Buying an apartment in Alanya from a developer online is Easy!
service_online_purchase.seo_description: Buy and register real estate in Alanya without coming to Turkey. Stages: 1. Choosing a residential complex 2. Inspection of real estate by video call 3. Drawing up a sales contract 4. Drawing up a power of attorney 5. Ordering furniture

text: Buying and registering real estate in Alanya without coming to Turkey is easy. The remote real estate purchase and registration service provided by BestHome Construction is becoming more and more popular.

cards.title: 1. Choosing a residential complex
cards.text: You can contact our managers in a convenient way for you - via WhatsApp, Telegram, Skype or e-mail, and you can also order a call back. After you indicate your preferences, the company's managers will compile an individual portfolio that meets your wishes, provide complete information on apartments and answer all your questions.

cards.title: 2. Inspection of real estate by video call
cards.text: The manager of the company will conduct an online broadcast on the spot, showing the area in which the complex is located, places nearby, the road to the sea. If the complex is ready, the infrastructure of the complex and the apartment that interests you, as well as the view from the balcony and windows.

cards.title: 3. Drawing up a sales contract
cards.text: Having agreed on the payment plan for the purchased apartment, you will need to inform the manager of your contact information, as well as send a copy of your passport. Based on this information in two languages ​​(Russian and Turkish), a purchase-and-sale agreement will be drawn up, which will be sent to you by e-mail or WhatsApp, Telegram for approval. After the confirmation received from you, the contract will be signed by our construction company, scanned and sent to you. After putting your signatures, you will also send the contract to the company manager.

cards.title: 4. Execution of a power of attorney
cards.text: If you cannot come to Turkey to become a proprietor, you issue a power of attorney at the Turkish Embassy (according to the template sent by the manager of our company) in order for the Certificate of Title to be issued in your name without personal presence. Thanks to the new system, there is no need to mail the power of attorney issued to you. By sending a copy of it, an employee of the company can receive the original at any notary office in the city.

cards.title: 5. Ordering furniture
cards.text: If you want to come to an already furnished apartment, the company manager will send options for furniture packages that match your preferences and budget. The company's employees will make sure that the furniture is delivered on time, assembled and placed in the apartment exactly as you planned. It is also worth noting that there is an opportunity to use the services of our interior designer, he will select accessories that will decorate your new home.

conclusion: Thus, you can be sure that upon arrival in Turkey you will have a ready-to-move, cozy apartment that will surpass all your expectations.
If you have decided to purchase real estate in Alanya, but are not ready for an online purchase, we will be happy to offer you the service of an individual study tour.

service_after_sale_services.seo_title: Post service for our property buyers in Alanya from BEST HOME
service_after_sale_services.seo_description: After-sales service for our buyers and owners of real estate in Alanya, Turkey - will help with any question in an unfamiliar country for you. Aydat, ordering water or gas, connecting the Internet and buying furniture

text: The acquisition of property in Turkey may seem daunting and over complicated when, in fact, the procedure is actually rather simple and largely 'red-tape' free.

service_after_sale_services.slot_text_1: Our professionals, all of whom are multi-lingual, with be with you on the property purchase journey every step of the way, from finding you the right property, assisting with furnishings, arranging title deed tranfer and that all important key delivery!
service_after_sale_services.slot_text_2: Once you have taken delivery of your property, we will continue to assist you in any way we can.

header.title:
Some of our 'after-sales' services include

list: Transfer to / from the airports of Antalya and Alanya-Gazipasa;

Assistance in obtaining a residence permit and Turkish citizenship.

all_about_rent.seo_title: Real estate for rent in the center of Alanya. How to rent a house in Turkey?
all_about_rent.seo_description: BEST HOME will help you to rent real estate in Alanya and Mahmutlar or rent an apartment in residential complexes for long-term or daily rent on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea.

text: For those that might consider utilising their property as an income producing asset, then you have come to the right place!

Given the huge amount of incoming visitors and the amenable climate, good quality rental apartments in Alanya are in demand all year round and rental yields are good, both for short and long term rental periods.

The apartments in BestHome Construction projects are not only desirable from a lifestyle perspective, they can also be profitable investment assets. The majority of all units within our projects are sold well before project completion and it a fact that demand for these projects far outstrips supply. In this respect, we have a large database of clients looking to buy only in existing BestHome projects (on a re-sale basis).
So, if you ever feel that the time is right to sell your property (either with or without furniture), be assured that we have many potential buyers ready and waiting!

Regardless of whether you have purchased an apartment for a rental business or for a holiday, and want to rent your apartment only during the period when it is free, our partner company will be happy to provide all services related to the rental of your property:
cards: Professional photos and video presentation of your property

service_introductory_tour.seo_title: How to go on a sightseeing tour to Turkey, Free! Inspection of apartments
service_introductory_tour.seo_description: If you have decided to purchase real estate in Alanya, but are not ready for an online purchase, we will be happy to offer you the service of an individual study tour

text: If you have decided to purchase real estate in Alanya and would like to view any property in person, why not join us on an Inspection Tour?  An inspection tour, with a duration of 3-4 days will allow you to look at a selection of preferred properties as well as allowing you to get a real feel for the sights and sounds of Alanya - indeed, you should also get an insight as to what being a property owner here is all about!

service_introductory_tour.slot_text_1: If you have decided to purchase a property in Alanya, but are not ready for an online purchase, we will be happy to offer you the service of an individual study tour.

post_1.title: Meeting at the airport
post_1.paragraph_1: After you have purchased your a flight ticket, send this to your sales manager and he or she can commence planning your tour. Upon arrival at the airport, either Antalya or Alanya-Gazipasa, you will be met by one of our chauffeurs - he will drive you to your appointed accommodation.

article_1.title: Accommodation in an apartment in one of our complexes
text: In order for you to feel what it may be like as an owner of property in Alanya, you will be hosted in one of our guest apartments. Here you can appreciate the quality of fit and finishing down to the very smallest of details!
Your sales manager will be there to greet you upon arrival and make sure that you are settled in before meeting up the next day.

post_2.title: Getting to know the districts of Alanya
post_2.paragraph_1: We will start the day with the famous Turkish breakfast, rich in variety and taste and which no Turk would ever start their day without - we will ensure the location offers stunning far-reaching views of the Alanya cityscape and the Mediterranean Sea. We may also have the time for a stroll around the Harbour area before the real business begins! which is famous not only for the variety of organic products, but also for the magnificent views of the mountains and the sea.
post_2.paragraph_2: You will then be shown around those regions of Alanya in which the BestHome projects are located.

post_3.title: Presentation in the office of the company
post_3.paragraph_1: We will return to the office for a presentation of those projects specifically chosen by you to be of interest. At this stage, we will also provide further information in respect of the property purchasing procedure.

post_4.title: Conclusion of a sales contract
post_4.paragraph_1: One you have settled on your ideal property, we will prepare a sales contract - this will be in two languages - English and Turkish. We will also request a tax number,  a pre-requisite for property title transfer - this number will also be needed when opening a bank account.

post_5.title: Power of attorney execution
post_5.paragraph_1: If you cannot come to Turkey for title deed registration, you can opt to assign Power of Attorney (POA). This will allow us to transfer the title deed to you in your absence (as well as transferring water and electricity subscriptions into your name).

post_6.title: Visiting furniture stores
post_6.paragraph_1: If you wish to purchase furniture for your property during this inspection tour, we will accompany you to a number of stores in order that you get an idea of availability and price.

post_7.title: Transfer from Alanya to airport
post_7.paragraph_1: At the appointed time, your chauffeur will pick you up and take you back to the airport for your flight home.
post_7.paragraph_2: Should you decide to purchase a property from BestHome, all flight costs will be re-imbursed.

service_legal_support.seo_title: Buying an apartment in Turkey (Alanya). All the intricacies of a legal transaction
service_legal_support.seo_description: The specialists of our company not only prepare all the necessary documents for the transfer of ownership to your name, but also check the legal purity of all documents for the acquisition of secondary real estate

text: The specialists of our company will  prepare all the necessary documents for the transfer of ownership into your name.

service_legal_support.slot_text_1: After the conclusion of the purchase and sale agreement, we will request a tax number, necessary for the title deed transfer and for opening a bank account in Turkey.

post_1.paragraph_1: We will submit an application to the Land Registry and accompany you on the appointed date of title transfer. Оnce you have received your title deed, water and electricity subscriptions will also be transferred into your name.

post_2.paragraph_1: In case you cannot come to Turkey for the title deed registration, you can assign Power of Attorney - this will allow us to complete all formalities in your absence.

post_3.paragraph_1: We can also assist with all legal and administrative issues in respect of  your application for Turkish residency. In addition, we can assist will of issues relating to Turkish citizenship (if applicable).

service_turkish_citizenship.seo_title: Turkish citizenship. All the benefits of Turkish citizenship
service_turkish_citizenship.seo_description: How to get Turkish citizenship when buying real estate. Dual citizenship with Turkey. Turkish citizens not only have the right to reside in the country without any obstacles and restrictions, but also have other advantages

text: The Turkish citizenship through property investment program has been an unequivocal success. It is estimated that, in the last 2 years, 'new' citizen  passports have been issued at a rate of more than 800 per day!Since 2019, foreign investors have had a real opportunity to make their dreams come true. Now, when buying a property worth $ 250,000 or more, you can get Turkish citizenship under a simplified scheme. Moreover, the owners of a house or apartment, their spouses and children under 18 can become full citizens directly.

service_turkish_citizenship.slot_text_1: Turkey is a great place for seasonal recreation and for living. Many foreigners dream of moving to the Republic of Turkey for permanent residence. Go into business. Buy your own home. And move to the land of the hot sun with your family.

header.title: Real benefits for foreigners
text: Turkish citizens not only have the right to reside in the country without any obstacles and restrictions, but also have other advantages, such as:
subtext: In addition, taxes for Turkish citizens are lower than for foreign investors, as are bank interest on mortgages and loans.

list: Social benefits and assistance from the state;
Obtaining loans with a low interest rate;
Purchase of land for personal and business purposes;
Possibility of registration of legal entities;

article_1.title: What do you need to know?

post_1.paragraph_1: It is important to remember that a foreigner who has acquired property in order to obtain Turkish citizenship does not have the right to sell it for 3 years. But a house or apartment can be rented out for a long-term or short-term lease, which will allow you not only to invest money profitably,but also to increase your capital.
post_1.paragraph_2: BestHome Constructi Our reson company specializes in the sale of Turkish real estate in the best areas of Alanya and other regions of the country.idential complexes are perfect for investment, seasonal recreation and year-round living, thanks to the convenient location, well-developed infrastructure, high quality construction and finishing, our residential complexes are perfect for investments, seasonal vacations and permanent residence.

post_2.paragraph_1: To buy a house or apartment in Alanya, you do not have to leave the country in which you are located. It is enough to issue a power of attorney for a lawyer at the Turkish embassy, send all the necessary documents by mail. Our consultants will tell you more about the procedure.

post_3.paragraph_1: When purchasing real estate and obtaining Turkish citizenship, there are many nuances because the documents must be properly drawn up. Our BestHome Construction specialists have full competence and experience from the legal side of this issue.
post_3.paragraph_2: We cooperate with trusted law firms that specialize in obtaining Turkish citizenship for foreign investors. With our help, more  than a dozen clients have successfully purchased high-quality housing in developed areas and become legal citizens of the Republic of Turkey.

post_4.title: Another good news!
post_4.paragraph_1: Many developers in Alanya offer favorable terms of installments for foreigners who want to invest their capital and become the owner of an apartment or villa at the stage of construction of a residential complex. Thus, Turkish legislation allows you to obtain Turkish citizenship even before the house is put into operation.

company_about_company.seo_title: BEST HOME Construction is the leading construction company in Alanya
company_about_company.seo_description: The company has its own representatives in Germany, America, Russia, Ukraine, Iran, Kazakhstan, as well as in Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Finland. The company has already concluded more than 1000 successful transactions with foreign citizens living in the CIS, USA, Europe and the Middle East.

header.title: About company
text: BestHome Construction is a full service real estate company and one of the top developers in the Alanya region After having been founded in 2004, primarily as an agency, it was in 2008 that we made the decision to develop our 'own-brand' projects.

Since that time we have, to date, delivered 33 residential projects across the Alanya region - are current projects can be found in those regions most in demand from overseas buyers, including  Mahmutlar, Avsallar and Oba.
The firm has several overseas representative offices, including  Germany, USA, Ukraine, Iran, Kazakhstan, Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Finland.

Today, with the advancement of technology, it is possible to purchase property in Turkey without having the need to visit! Indeed, more and more of our buyers are searching and sourcing their properties online - even the title deed transfer can be concluded remotely!

slider.text: Professional approach - innovation in design and the use of the latest technologies and materials

Quality control at every stage of development -
a multi-level verification system.
Professional advice on finishing and fitting - all important to ensure we deliver to you your dream home in the Sun
Bank guarantees - provided for all client monies received
Transparency of documentation - contracts drafted in your own language and compliant with international law
A full range of services for the maintenance and management of your property.

article_1.title: Real Estate in Alanya
text: Why Alanya? Simply because it offers  diverse range of property types to satisfy even the demanding of buyers and at prices to suit!

The social facilities within our projects are equal to those found in the very best hotels and the vision and skill of our designers ensure living spaces that are functional, comfortable and  aesthetically striking.

Alanya and Oba are the most prestigious areas, suitable for living and seasonal recreation, as well as for profitable investment of money. In the future, the company plans to expand the boundaries of construction.

The developer offers to buy quality apartments on the Mediterranean coast. The buildings are built and finished in the best European traditions. The housing meets high international standards. Spacious rooms with high ceilings, fine finishing using ECO materials. Partial or full furnishings, built-in household appliances. Variety of decorative solutions will be appreciated even by very demanding clients.

To choose housing, taking into account your wishes, requirements and financial capabilities, you can go on an introductory tour or trust the professionalism of the company's employees, who will agree on all important organizational issues for the client.
Thanks to the competent planning, in new buildings you can buy apartments from different price segments. Small apartments and or luxury penthouses on the upper floors.
So, by contacting BestHome Construction, you get the opportunity to buy apartments in Alanya at the most favorable price, including issue an interest-free installment plan from the developer,
You can purchase housing for personal use or for rent without leaving your country.
You can entrust the after-sales service of your apartment, villa or office to a Leader Management subsidiary, confident that all your administrative, legal and financial obligations are met.
As well as consultations on the choice, assistance in obtaining a residence permit and citizenship, legal and financial support for each transaction.
Trust Us - more than 17 years experience of providing only the very best real estate solutions.

header.title: Our Difference in Reliability
text: When making the decision to invest in overseas property, two of the primary considerations when choosing your overseas investment partner are: Reliability and Trust.
Whether purchasing from a lifestyle perspective or from an investment angle, all clients must have absolute confidence in the people they are working with.

In order that their investment is directed into the most appropriate projects, investors need expert local knowledge in order to ensure that the property has been priced in accordance with current market values, that the project will be completed and delivered on time and that it presents a profitable and efficient investment vehicle for the foreseeable future.

Best Home have been at the forefront of the real estate business in Alanya for more than 16 years and in that time, have conceived and delivered some of the most notable residential projects in the region. With a reputation for excellence, we appreciate that our customers, both past and present, are our most valuable asset and this must remain so if our business is to be sustained.
We at BestHome can provide a ‘one-stop’ service for all your property investment requirements in Alanya

”From our initial consultation through to the signing of property purchase contract, from shopping for furniture through to the transfer of your title deed, we will be with you every step of the way.”

post_1.title: Construction quality
paragraph_1: Construction quality is the primary factor of choosing property
We understand that you want your home to be safe, problem-free, remain inhabitable indefinitely and retain its value should you decide to sell it.
We can ensure you that all of our projects are built to the highest of standards.

post_2.title: Innovation
post_2.paragraph_1: We are constantly reviewing our construction methods to ensure they incorporate the best elements of modern technology.

article_1.title: Unique location
text: A lot depends on the location of your apartment. The favorable location guarantees you not only a comfortable life, but also the opportunity, if necessary, to sell your property very profitably.

BestHome Construction chooses only the best areas of Alanya with excellent infrastructure for its projects. The plots on which the projects are being built are of great value. Around them, as a rule, everything has been built up for a long time. Accordingly, the infrastructure in such areas is very active. Here you will find many parks, squares and green areas for a comfortable family vacation.

When implementing new projects, our company invariably gives preference to such areas as the center of Alanya (including the Damlatash area) and Oba. In Oba, due to the limitation in the height of projects according to the city plan, the company's margins are often lower, but that is why all projects are used as highly liquid ones. This area has been considered European for about 15 years. Cozy complexes with 5-storey blocks and swimming pools conquered Europeans with their laconic style and comfort.

And finally, the most popular area among our clients is Damlatas. It is located in the very center of Alanya and very close to the main city. It has everything you need for a calm and comfortable life: landscaped beaches marked with the Blue Flag, schools, hospitals, cafes, restaurants, tennis courts and chic walking areas. The special charm of Damlatas is given by the fact that the building height is limited to five floors here, and the road along the embankment is one-way. Despite the large number of tourists, it is always comfortable and calm here. The cost of housing in this area is quite high, which guarantees you a profitable investment in real estate and the possibility of further renting out an apartment or selling it at a more attractive price.

post_3.title: Design
post_3.paragraph_1: Intelligent design and attention to detail ensure our homes are built to suit your lifestyle and to keep pace with the demands of modern life.

post_4.title: Craftsmanship
post_4.paragraph_1: Our highly skilled workforce take pride in delivering the exceptional standards on which we have built our reputation.

post_5.title: Specification
post_5.paragraph_1: By carefully sourcing quality materials we aim to meet the very high standards you expect.

article_2.title: Our Difference in Design
text: In the competitive world that is the Alanya real estate industry, it is important always to stay ahead of the competition – one way to do this is by offering something totally unique in terms of design, both externally and internally.

As an example, all Best Home projects are low-rise and the external facade will incorporate a mix of materials and finishes that will set it apart from other developments in the area – additionally, the external social areas will comprise lush landscaping, decorative walling and a tiled sun terrace surrounding the pool.

For the interior of each property, we have a highly skilled and specialised interior design team that enable us to constantly deliver modern living spaces of the very highest quality – this quality is evident throughout, not just in the fittings and fixtures but also in the design detail. For example, the kitchens have an ample expanse of bench space and ample upper and lower storage, both critical elements in modern apartment living.
In addition to the interior design being streamlined and aesthetically pleasing, all fittings and fixtures are long lasting and hard wearing.

By paying close attention to these design details, we believe our projects are a cut above the rest and one of the the primary reasons why our projects are so successful – as an example, some 75% of all units (within any project) are sold well before project completion.

Additionally, this close attention to detail ‘adds value’ to all units within a specific project and will go some way to ensuring its status as an investment asset, both at the time of purchase as well as at the time (if appropriate) of reselling.

These ‘value added’ details are also important for those clients that are ‘buying to rent’ – with the rental market in Alanya continuing to grow, highly specified apartments (within a good location) are at the top of every renter’s wish list!

header.title: The first steps
text: The history of BestHome Construction began in 2004 in Alanya, when two young people decided to start their own business in Turkey, based on long-term partnerships, European understanding of service and respect for customers. They wanted to create a company with Turkish traditions and a European face. The new fast-growing real estate market was perfectly suited for this purpose, although there was already competition then. But the founders of the company believed that their brainchild would be able to take a leading position and, as later life showed, they were not mistaken in their forecasts.

Based on the experience of working in the leading real estate agency in Alanya, they understood that there was no such product on the market that they would like to offer to demanding European clients, as well as quality after-sales service. Then decisions were made that determined the way for the further development of the company. The first is to build houses of European quality level that meet the expectations and wishes of clients, the second is to keep these promises, to create trusting relationships with clients, the third is to be innovators and legislators in the real estate market of Alanya, and the fourth is to introduce as many clients around the world as possible to the beautiful city. Alanya and the unrivaled Turkish culture, add value to the region.

history_slider.title: The first steps
history_slider.subtitle: The history of BestHome Construction began in 2004 in Alanya, when two young people decided to start their own business in Turkey, based on long-term partnerships, European understanding of service and respect for customers.

history_slider.title: First project
history_slider.subtitle: Partners of the company Ali Yetgin and Per Holm, together with Danish investors, buy out an entire project in the Cikcilli region of Alanya and give it the name - BestHome Resort. The main clients of the company are Danes

history_slider.title: Emerging market
history_slider.subtitle: The company actively enters the Norwegian market. The following projects were put into operation: BestHome Residence 1, BestHome Residence 2, Tofko Villas. Also this year, a decree is issued prohibiting the registration of Tapu for foreigners. Sales to foreigners stop.

history_slider.title: The law on real estate
history_slider.subtitle: The government approves a law allowing foreigners to buy property in Turkey. Employees of the company are busy with the registration of Tapu (certificate of ownership) for clients who purchased apartments before the law was passed in 2006

history_slider.title: A new direction
history_slider.subtitle: The partners of the company understand that a new direction is opening on the market: Russian-speaking clients from the CIS countries. Their wishes are inexpensive, small apartments in the central districts of the city. The partners decide to buy out the apart-hotel and reconstruct it into apartments.

history_slider.title: BestHome City 1 & 2
history_slider.subtitle: The complexes BestHome City 1 and BestHome City 2 were commissioned. Ali Yetgina's partner, Per Holm, decides to return to Denmark and leaves the list of founders.

history_slider.title: Quality
history_slider.subtitle: We are confident that the quality of construction is one of the main criteria for choosing real estate in Alanya. Building new complexes, we understand that you want your house to be durable, strong and reliable, does not require constant repairs and does not lose its liquidity over time. We guarantee that all construction work in our houses was carried out at a high quality level in compliance with all regulatory requirements.

history_slider.title: New technologies
history_slider.subtitle: The complexes BestHome City 3, BestHome City 4, BestHome City 5 and BestHome City 6 were commissioned. For the first time in Alanya, the walls between the apartments were built with a depth of 2 bricks of two bricks, with Knauf glass wool used as insulation material.

history_slider.title: 4 more projects
history_slider.subtitle: The complexes BestHome 8 Yuksek, BestHome City 9 and BestHome City 10, BestHome City 11 were commissioned.

history_slider.title: BestHome 12 Comfort
history_slider.subtitle: The BestHome 12 Comfort complex was  commissioned . The company enters the Iranian market.

history_slider.title: New infrastructure
history_slider.subtitle: The complexes BestHome City 14 and BestHome 15 VIP were commissioned. BestHome 15 VIP is the company's first complex with an expanded infrastructure. It was here that a special platform for sunbathing directly in the pool was created for the first time in Alanya -  500-year-old olive trees were planted!

history_slider.title: 4 new projects
history_slider.subtitle: The complexes BestHome 16 VIP, BestHome 17 Cleopatra, BestHome City 18 and BestHome City 19 were commissioned.

history_slider.title: Large-scale projects
history_slider.subtitle: The company's management understands that despite the demand from Russian-speaking clients, there are no projects, thus far, than can truly claim to occupy the luxury segment. In this respect, Alanya Towers was born, to date the largest project within our portfolio.

history_slider.title: The luxury segment
history_slider.subtitle: The company's management understands that despite the demand from Russian-speaking clients, there are no decent apartments in the luxury segment on the real estate market in Alanya, and BestHome Construction begins construction of the largest of the complexes previously built by the company - Alanya Towers.

history_slider.title: Alanya Towers
history_slider.subtitle: The Alanya Towers complex becomes operational into operation and becomes our 'benchmark' project, one upon which all future projects will be judged! Today, it is considered to be the most exclusive complex in the Antalya region.

history_slider.title: Cleopatra District
history_slider.subtitle: The main buyers of real estate in Alanya are still residents of the CIS countries. But due to the economic instability in their countries, clients prefer to purchase apartments that will bring them a stable rental income, as well as increase their capital upon sale. The leaders of the company understand that the most liquid place in Alanya is still the Cleopatra beach area and the complexes built here will be able to fully meet these rental income priorities.

history_slider.title: Important year
history_slider.subtitle: In February, the company acquires a detached three-story building, which will house the company's new office, which will include all departments under one roof: construction, sales, agriculture, car sales.

history_slider.title: Future
history_slider.subtitle: We are proud of our projects. But this year we would like to share with you our yet another new premium project Best Home 36-37 The Legend, which conquers history in real estate. Best Home 36-37 The Legend is a unique complex in the very center of Alanya with the infrastructure of a 5 * hotel, which is 120 meters from the sandy beach.

post_1.title: “We are proud of the history of our company and are trying to reach new heights in the real estate industry”

title.title: About the quality of construction
description: We are confident that the quality of construction is one of the main criteria for choosing real estate in Alanya. When building new complexes, we understand that you want the house to be durable, strong and reliable, does not require constant repairs and does not lose its value over time.
We guarantee that all construction work in our houses was carried out at a high quality level in compliance with all regulatory requirements.

info.title: Construction innovation
info.description: We constantly closely monitor the technologies used and the changing trends in the construction sector.

standard.title: Our quality standard for the bathroom

list.title: Automatic ventilation
text: Automation of ventilation system is a complex of automatic control of indoor climate. Automatic ventilation and air conditioning systems provide the right conditions for air movement in rooms. At the same time they save energy, keep cold and heat, and reduce the need for maintenance personnel.

list.title: Smoothing waterproofing
text: A popular material for protecting various surfaces from the action of water. Hot and cold bitumen is used for waterproofing pipes, foundations, sumps, piles.

list.title: Thermal insulation
text: Thanks to thermal insulation it is possible to significantly reduce the energy cost of maintaining the desired temperature inside. Heat pipes are surrounded by thermal insulation to reduce the cooling or heating of the heat transfer medium. Protect against corrosion. Thermal insulation has vapor-proof and noise-proof properties.
Completely isolates the room from the sewer, preventing the emergence of unpleasant odors.

list.title: Linear gangway 60 cm
text: The most powerful in terms of the volume of wastewater accepted compared to the point and corner.

list.title: Extruded polystyrene foam (XPS)
text: Highly effective thermal insulation material of increased strength.

Features: environmental friendliness, safety, absolute bioproofness, consistently low thermal conductivity, almost zero water absorption, (homogeneous structure of closed independent cells), high compressive strength, proven durability.

list.title: Smoothing waterproofing
text: It protects the building, both inside and outside, against condensation, leaks in pipes and other troubles associated with excessive moisture.
Thanks to the protection against moisture, the durability of the entire structure is also increased.

list.title: Bentonite mat
text: Based on bentonite clay with waterproofing.
Advantages: self-repair, high waterproofing properties, high strength, resistance to tearing and damage, environmental friendliness, durability.

list.title: Subconcrete
text: Creates a layer of waterproofing.
Protects the foundation from groundwater.
Redistributes pressure.
Allows for better reinforcement.
Eliminates shrinkage of the building.

knauf: Glass wool light mineral wool for heat - and sound insulation of frame walls, partitions, pitched roofs, floors on the floor and floors.

Safe - without the use of phenol-formaldehyde and acrylic resins. Advantages: water-repellent impregnation, aquastatik, resilient, non-combustible. Protection system «3-in-1», against cold, noise, water.

unique_roofing.title: Unique roofing
unique_roofing.text: Come up with a description here, perhaps even SEO text on the subject of a unique roof on a couple of lines (you can more), but such that you can read it.

list.title: 6 mm thick galvanized sheet
list.text: Galvanized steel roofs can withstand the strongest climatic loads. Galvanized profile perfectly withstands wind loads, hail, temperature fluctuations, the influence of ultraviolet radiation. The main advantages of galvanized roofs: durability, robustness, reliability, maximum strength.

list.title: Waterproofing layer weighing 175 grams
list.text: Obligatory protection of elements under construction from the damaging effects of water and high humidity. Using waterproofing materials prevents material deterioration (rotting of wood, metal corrosion), the formation of harmful micro-organisms (fungus and mold), in addition, increases life and the successful operation of construction.

list.title: 1st oriented chipboard at 11 mm
list.text: Multilayer sheet made of long flat wood chips impregnated with phenol-formaldehyde resins and synthetic wax.

list.title: Z-profile
list.text: Z-profile is made from prefabricated, high-quality, hot-dip galvanized or painted steel sheet. Z profile got its name because of its appearance resembling the English letter «Z».

list.title: Basalt wool 10 cm long (thermal insulation)
list.text: Insulating and soundproofing material, which is a compressed board consisting of interlaced fibers. A distinctive quality is fire safety, chemical neutrality to various substances, as well as durability, counted in decades.

list.title: 2nd oriented chipboard 11 mm
list.text: Multilayer sheet made of long flat wood chips impregnated with phenol-formaldehyde resins and synthetic wax. Located after the basalt wool.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy policy
text: We are committed to ensuring the security of our customers 'information and data. In this regard, a policy has been developed that explains how we maintain the privacy of our customers and how we handle our customers' personal data.
We use data and information provided by our customers at their own request, and do not collect personal data from customers who visit the website. We only store the data provided.

It is common knowledge that visits to any website, including requests from the host server, log the IP address (Internet Protocol) of the visitor's device, as well as the date and time of entry. The browser type and external referring site address are also recorded.

Like all other sites, contains links to other external sites. We are not responsible for the content and privacy policies of other sites. However, before visiting those sites, we encourage our customers to read the privacy policies of those sites.

We always strive to maintain and confidentiality of all personal information and data that our clients provide. Unless required by law or new legislation, or we believe (in good faith) that such action is desirable or required by law, or in defense of our customers, we do our best to protect the privacy of Internet property.

We will contact consumers directly if the need to satisfy requests requires the use of the data provided. We will obtain the prior written consent of the client before disclosing any data provided to a third party for marketing purposes that benefit that party. We may request permission to use of the data for statistical research purposes. This data will not contain any information that could identify the client.
In addition, the data provided should be used in response to requests from the website team, as well as in response to customer comments and questions.
We will not disclose, rent, trade, or sell any information to third parties outside of this or any of our other websites. Information will only be disclosed by order of the regulatory body!

If necessary or necessary, reserves the right to amend the privacy conditions and the Information Privacy Policy, our clients will receive notifications about the data we receive, how it will be used and who receives this data.
When the need dictates, we gladly accept calls from customers at the numbers listed on the "contact us" tab on the website or via the email form provided on this tab.

term-of-use.title: Terms of Use
text: Welcome to our cherished website clients. We would like to bring your attention to the site. Let us point out that by browsing the website, you are tacitly agreeing to the terms of use and its privacy policy.

In addition, all websites, social media pages and all the numerous electronic accounts on the Internet are officially registered as Turkish brands. Our network includes articles, website designs, websites, logos and brands.

If there is evidence that the Organization, either on the territory of the Republic of Turkey or on the Internet, has used, published or copied any videos, photographs, written scripts or any other materials from the website, including the real estate website, for commercial purposes, without prior authorization from management, action will be taken. The Legal Department must file a complaint in writing with the Higher Institute for Brand and Intellectual Creation Rights and send a complaint by mail to Google Network informing the company of the violation and initiating legal proceedings.

We also declare that in the event that a trademark is used or plagiarized by a legal entity, our legal department retains the group's rights accredited to the Turkish government by filing a claim with the Higher Institute of Brands and Intellectual Property Rights for damages for the plagiarism.
These are the site's terms of use:
The content of the site is subject to change on the site without notice at any time by the site management.

The research carried out and the information contained on the website is available to customers as a reference source of support and assistance. The site administration is not responsible for inaccurate information or content on the site.
The application or use of any information or materials available on the pages of the site is the responsibility of the user. The site management does not interfere in any way.

The ownership of the licensed materials on the site belongs solely to the site management. Therefore, the content of the site must not be tampered with by copying, reproducing or quoting, especially for investment and real estate research, company logo and website design.
Infringement or abuse of the copyright or intellectual property rights of the BestHome website by unscrupulous users may be subject to legal liability.

As additional information for our customers, some pages of our website may sometimes contain links to websites that our customers may find useful. However, BestHome is not responsible for useless or inaccurate information or materials.
Our clients are allowed to create external links to the site without the explicit permission of the site management.

slides.name: Anna Larina
slides.text: Hello, I am Anna, I will answer any of your questions! We build with taste, use modern technologies, think through planning and landscaping of courtyards as we would do it for our own home.

accordions.title: Company experience
accordions.content: Our company has its representatives in the USA, Russia, Norway, Finland, Germany, Ukraine, Iran, Denmark and Sweden. We have helped over 1000 foreign investors from America, Europe, the CIS and the Middle East to buy real estate in Alanya at a profit.

accordions.title: Buying real estate as an investment
accordions.content: Due to the unique location of residential complexes of residential complexes and high quality construction, we guarantee stable profits for investors who purchase houses and apartments in Alanya for short and long-term rentals.

accordions.title: Trust management
accordions.content: The management of residential complexes BestHome Construction in Alanya is carried out by a subsidiary company Leader Management, providing customers with a full range of services and warranty obligations.

accordions.title: Quality and reliability
accordions.content: Our motto is 'Best Advertising - First-class Quality'. We know how to find an individual approach to clients. We independently finance the construction of residential complexes, provide our clients with bank guarantees. And the legal purity of transactions guarantees the safety of investments.

accordions.title: Terms and guarantees
accordions.content: We strictly adhere to the deadlines for putting objects into operation, we control the construction at every stage. We provide guarantees for up to 5 years, including the exterior finishing of the network and water supply.

accordions.title: Custom design
accordions.content: Individual design - during the construction phase, our clients can order redevelopment of premises, as well as the development of a unique design, taking into account their requirements and wishes. BestHome Construction employs first-class designers and architects. For maximum transparency, cooperation and customer support is carried out in the investor's native language, including the registration of the monetary policy.

accordions.title: Services
accordions.content: For maximum transparency, including drawing up a purchase and sale agreement, customer support is carried out in the investor's native language, including the execution of the contract of sale.

accordions.title: Our office
accordions.content: Our office is located in the very center of Alanya. Three floors, one-stop service - sales, property management, post-sales services, after sales and designer services

footer.footer_company_title:
BestHome Construction
is a leading construction
company in Alanya
footer_company_description: One of the leading companies in the Turkish market. Started as a real estate agency in 2004. To date, more than 33 projects have been implemented in the center of Alanya and in the Oba region. The firm has its own representatives in Germany, America, Russia, Ukraine, Iran, Kazakhstan, as well as in Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Finland. The company has already concluded more than 1000 successful transactions with foreign citizens living in the CIS, USA, Europe and the Middle East. Today it is a construction company in Alanya, with the help of which any foreigner can profitably and quickly buy an apartment or a private house without leaving his country. All issues are resolved remotely. You can conclude an agreement and issue a TAPU remotely.

You can entrust the after-sale service of your apartment, villa or office to a subsidiary company Leader Management, being sure that all your administrative, legal and financial obligations are fulfilled, as well as consultations on your choice, assistance in obtaining a residence permit and citizenship, legal and financial support for each transactions. Trust professionals with over 17 years of experience in the Turkish market - contact us.
